remark.ch: 1.上課地點：中研院地球所314室 2.限TIGP學生
remark.en: 1.)Classroom：Room 314, 5th floor, Institute of Earth Sciences, Academia Sinica., 2.)TIGP students only

goal.ch: Seismology is crucial in probing the Earth‘s structures and understanding earthquake source properties. Low-frequency seismology encompasses surface waves and normal modes of the Earth, both of which are essential tools for studying earthquake sources and Earth‘s structures. This course introduces the theoretical background and synthetics of surface waves and normal modes of the Earth.
goal.en: Seismology is crucial in probing the Earth‘s structures and understanding earthquake source properties. Low-frequency seismology encompasses surface waves and normal modes of the Earth, both of which are essential tools for studying earthquake sources and Earth‘s structures. This course introduces the theoretical background and synthetics of surface waves and normal modes of the Earth.

outline.ch: Surface wave, Free oscillation, Propagator Matrix, Tomography, Synthetics
outline.en: Surface wave, Free oscillation, Propagator Matrix, Tomography, Synthetics

textbook.ch: Quantitative Seismology, 2nd edition (2002), Aki and Richards
textbook.en: Quantitative Seismology, 2nd edition (2002), Aki and Richards

ch.competencies: 進階數理及專業知識能力
觀測模擬及分析推理能力
國際視野與語文溝通能力
專業倫理及服務學習之能力
電腦及程式語言應用能力

en.competencies: Advanced mathematical and professional knowledge and ability
Observation simulation and analysis of reasoning ability
International perspective and language communication skills
